wikipedia_page.main: Kenneth 'Kenny' Jenkins (28 February 1945 – 13 November 2009) was a Scottish footballer who played in attack and defence. Jenkins played for Johnstone Burgh, Albion Rovers, Dumbarton and APIA Leichhardt Tigers.

link_mentions.page: List of people with surname Jenkins

response: The same weekend long term utility player Kenny Jenkins announced his intention to emigrate to Australia. Over five seasons Jenkins had played 175 matches for Dumbarton and had scored 22 goals.
